Good quality for the size of the file, but I agree with technosailor. You could improve the video by using H264 compression, at higher bitrates (766kbps is low for a "720p", 950~1050 is nice for that resolution). And you could use HE-AAC compression for the audio at 64~84kbps, still using 2 channels. HE-AAC compresses way better than the normal AAC. I would recommend you to use HE-AACv2, but some players use to have problems in running it.
Don't bother increasing the torrents size from 0,9gb to 1,1gb, most of the people won't care, even because those xvid crap thats comming these days are 640x480 and are way heavier (1,4gb). Graphics 2x better for only +200mb in the size. PLEASE.

After years of downloading hundreds of torrents here, I've never felt compelled to comment before today.  THAT'S how much this annoyed me:

AVC *IS* H264!

It's two different names for a compression standard, technically: "ISO/IEC 14496-10 â MPEG-4 Part 10, Advanced Video Coding"
